name: Nightmare Slayer
description:
Didn't have time to implement everything I wanted due to unexpected irl things.  This is a project I would be interested in making a focus if people think it has merit.  I was going for a semi obscure game called Pain Killer along with classic Resident Evil.  Tried to do an HTML build but never done one before and couldn't figure it out so download only.   Sorry it's a hot mess but I hope you enjoy!

Super new to making games, just graduated Game Design a few weeks ago and still getting my feet wet.  By no means an environmental artist so apologizes in advance for it looking so rough.  My main focus in this was to create a FPS combat system.  Combat systems are difficult to get feeling good so any comments or suggestions on how this FPS controller and combat can feel better would help me greatly.
